selector.afternoon: Good Afternoon, Please choose a server.
selector.morning: Good Morning, Please choose a server.

home.name: Grace Bot
home.i3:
Making Discord Fun Again
For {0} users and {1} servers!
home.i5: Utilize Grace to make your Discord guild funner, safer and smarter, all with a fully customizable dashboard!

logout.i5: You will be redirected once logout is finished!

notifications.title: Notification System
notifications.desc: Want to get updates for when your favorite creators upload, stream, and post content? With Grace, you can easily send notifications to your community within minutes!

reaction.title: Reaction Roles
reaction.desc: Give your community a new modern feel with Reaction Roles! With Grace, quickly let users give themselves roles based on the emoji selected! And loads more options!

xp.title: XP Leveling
xp.desc: Configure Grace to enchant your community members and let your members climb to the top with XP Leveling! Reward your most active members with free and unlimited role rewards and online

music.title: HD Music
music.desc: Jam With your friends! Play music in your voice channels for free! Listen to Twitch, YouTube, and more, for how long as you want!

communicate.title: Communicate with your community!
communicate.desc: Want to ask your community questions? With Grace, quickly use polls, announcements, and reminders to interact with your community!

success.title: Poll Added!
success.desc: The new poll was added in <#{{-id}}>!

disabled.title: Suggestions are disabled!
disabled.desc: Please do `{{prefix}}suggestconfig status enable` to enable!

missingChannel.title: Suggestions unavailable!
missingChannel.desc: Please do `{{prefix}}suggestconfig channel (Channel)` to set a channel!

respond.title: {{name}} has a suggestion!
respond.footer: Use the reactions to vote below!

respond.title: Prefix is now update!
respond.desc:
Your new prefix is `{{prefix}}`
We recommend using slash commands! Type `/` to get started.

notFound.title: User Not Found!
notFound.desc: Looks like the user isnt found! Have them talk in chat to start gaining xp!

requireVC.title: Oops!
requireVC.desc: You must be in a voice channel!

full.title: Voice Channel Full!
full.desc:
Looks like the voice channel is full! Try to make some room for me!
_I ate too many pancakes :3_

noNode.title: Cant Join!
noNode.desc:
Looks like I cant find a suitable music node to join!
**Try again in 5 mins**

invaildProvider.title: Provider Invaild
invaildProvider.desc:
The Provider `{{provider}}` selected is currently not supported, please use a song name or a different link.
Valid Providers: `{{validProviders}}`

moreSongsCantAdd.title: {{amount}} songs couldnt be added!
moreSongsCantAdd.desc:
Some songs couldnt be added maybe because of our queue max limit. 
Max limit for your guild: **{{queueLimit}}**

streamMissing.title: The stream couldnt be added.
streamMissing.desc: The stream you entered couldnt be found. Make sure the stream is live!

pickFrom.title: Please pick from {{startNumber}} - {{endNumber}}

playing.title: üé∂ Now Playing{{extraMsg}} üé∂

errorPlaying.title: ‚ùå Song Error! ‚ùå
errorPlaying.desc: Couldnt play that song! This song might be restricted!{{- extraMSG}}

leftOnlyPersn.title: Music Ended!
leftOnlyPersn.desc:
It looks like im the only one left!
To disable me leaving enable 24/7.{{- extraMSG}}

stopCommand.title: Music Ended!
stopCommand.desc: Stop command was issued. Music has ended!

queueEnd.title: Music Ended!
queueEnd.desc: No more music left! Music has ended!

songsAdded.title: {{amount}} song(s) were added!
songsAdded.desc: {{amount}} have been added to your queue limit.

zeorSongsAdded.title: No song(s) were added!
zeorSongsAdded.desc: No songs were added, there might be some info above.

sameVC.title: Not in the same VC!
sameVC.desc: We must be in the same voice channel!

notPlaying.title: Oops!
notPlaying.desc:
Looks like I'm not currently playing any music!
To get started run `{{prefix}}play [Song Title/Link]`

currentlyPlaying.title: üíø Now Playing{{extraMsg}} üíø

enable.title: üîÅ Repeat Enabled üîÅ
enable.desc: The current song will now repeat. _If shuffle is enabled its now disabled._

disable.title: üîÅ Repeat Disable üîÅ
disable.desc: The current song will no longer repeat.

enable.title: üîÄ Shuffle Enabled üîÄ
enable.desc: Music will now shuffle its queue. _If repeat is enabled its now disabled._

disable.title: üîÄ Shuffle Disable üîÄ
disable.desc: Music will no longer shuffle its queue.

enable.title: üõë 24/7 Mode Enabled üõë
enable.desc: Music will no longer end when everyone is gone.

disable.title: üõë 24/7 Mode Disable üõë
disable.desc: Grace will now leave when everyone is gone.

premium.title: Premium Required
premium.desc: 24/7 Mode requires premium! [Click Here]({{- url}}) to buy premium!

empty.title: Queue Empty
empty.desc: It looks like the queue is empty!

list.title: {{- name}}'s Music Queue.
list.desc:
[Click Here]({{- url}}) to see your queue online!

{{- list}}
list.footer: Page: {{page}}/{{total}}. Press the buttons below to see more/less of your queue.

forceSkip.title: Song force skipped.
forceSkip.desc: {{- username}} has done a force skip on the current song, overriding the skip limit.

disabled.title: Skips disabled!
disabled.desc:
Someone with the {{perm}} permission has disabled skips for this session.
Please use `--force` to force a skip.

skipped.title: Song Skipped
skipped.desc: The current song, {{- song }}, has been skipped

added.title: Skip vote added!
added.desc: I have added your vote to skip!

exist.title: You already voted!
exist.desc: It seems you already voted to skip the current song!

areYouSure.title: Are you sure?
areYouSure.desc:
Are you sure you want to delete {{msgs}}?
Only <@{{user}}> can respond to this message.

zero.title: No messages deleted.
zero.desc: No messages were found to delete.

respond.title: Deleted {{msgs}} Messages
respond.desc:
Successfully deleted {{msgs}}.
[Click Here]({{- url}}) to access your archive.
`Archive ID: {{id}}`
**Expires in 30days**

respond.title: NSFW status has been updated!
respond.desc:
NSFW status has been updated to {{- value}}
It will take up to 1 hour to propagate to discord to hide/show NSFW in slash commands.

hug.contentself: {{- user}} hugged themselves? _(Maybe they just need some love)_

kiss.contentself: {{- user}} kiss themselves? _(How? Did you use a mirror?)_

tickle.contentself: {{- user}} tickled themselves? _(How? That shouldnt be possible?)_

embed.title: Yayy! Patts <3!
embed.desc: Did something good to get a pat! >:D

noSearch.title: Help Command
noSearch.desc:
Here is a list of our help commands!
**For the privacy of peoples identity most NSFW commands are anime based!**
Most **System** commands are for Grace Bot Staff Only
**Quick Links**: [Dashboard](https://gracebot.net/dashboard/{{id}}?ref=botcmd), [Leaderboard](https://gracebot.net/leaderboard/{{id}}/?ref=botcmd), [Music Queue](https://gracebot.net/queue/{{id}}/?ref=botcmd), [Commands](https://gracebot.net/commands?shard={{shard}}&ref=botcmd)
noSearch.footer: Click the button below to view our online command menu.

noCommands.title: No Commands Found!
noCommands.desc:
The query `{{search}}` came up with no results. 
Please try again later or [**Click Here**](https://gracebot.net/commands?search={{- search}}) to view our online command page!.

command.title: Help Command | {{command}}
command.desc:
Your server prefix is set to `{{prefix}}` or use `/` then the command to run a command.
[**Click Here**](https://gracebot.net/commands?search={{- search}}) to view this command on our online command page!{{- extra}}

pick.title: Mutiple Search Results Found.
pick.desc: Please select from the menu below. If no responce after 15s or cancel button is pressed we will cancel this search.

pickCancel.title: The search has been canceled.
pickCancel.desc: The search was canceled please rerun the command.

maxed.title: You're maxed on your twitch notifcations!
maxed.desc: It seems you're maxed on twitch notifcations! Your limit is set to {{limit}}.

maxedNonPremium.title: You're maxed on your twitch notifcations!
maxedNonPremium.desc:
It seems you're maxed on twitch notifcations! Your limit is {{limit}}.
Have you tried upgrading to premium for additional twitch notifcations!

select.title: Please pick a streamer.
select.desc:
Please pick a streamer from the following menu below!.
Press cancel to cancel adding a streamer or wait 15s to automatically cancel.

selected.title: Selected {{- streamer}}
selected.desc: Adding the selected streamer to your notifcations list.

cancel.title: Select canceled
cancel.desc: The twitch select or has been canceled.

resolved.title: {{streamer}} has been added!
resolved.desc:
The streamer named `{{- streamer}}` has been added to the twitch notifcations.
You will get a notifcation in <#{{channel}}> when the streamer goes live.

list.title: Current Twitch Notifications {{amount}}/{{max}}
list.desc:
Twitch streamers that are currently being monitored for you:
{{- list}}

removed.title: {{streamer}} has been removed
removed.desc: We will no longer monitor this streamer for when they go live.

list.title: Current Reddit Notifications {{amount}}/{{max}}

maxed.title: You're maxed on your reddit notifcations!
maxed.desc: It seems you're maxed on reddit notifcations! Your limit is set to {{limit}}.

maxedNonPremium.title: You're maxed on your reddit notifcations!
maxedNonPremium.desc:
It seems you're maxed on reddit notifcations! Your limit is {{limit}}.
Have you tried upgrading to premium for additional twitch notifcations!

resolved.title: {{subreddit}} has been added!
resolved.desc:
The subreddit named `{{- subreddit}}` has been added to the reddit notifcations.
You will get a notifcation in <#{{channel}}> when a new post is in `{{- subreddit}}`.

areYouSure.title: Are you sure?
areYouSure.desc: Are you sure you want to remove {{subreddit}}?
areYouSure.footer: You will need to readd the subreddit again.

cancel.title: Removal of subreddit has been canceled
cancel.desc: Removal has been canceled because the cancel button was pressed or 15s has gone by without a reasponce.

removed.title: {{subreddit}} has been removed
removed.desc: We will no longer monitor this subreddit for new post.

website.respond: [Click Here]({{- site}}) to access our website!

dashboard.respond: [Click Here]({{- site}}) to view the current status of the bot to see if were having any issues!

commands.respond: [Click Here]({{- site}}) to view the online list of our commands for our bot!

areYouSure.title: Are you sure?
areYouSure.desc:
Are you sure you want to kick {{target}}?
This will remove them form the server requireing them to rejoin.
areYouSure.footer: Doing this will force the user to be removed.

responce.title: Kicked {{target}}.
responce.desc: {{target}} has been kicked from this server for, {{reason}}, case **#{{case}}**.

toUser.content: You have been kicked from **{{server}}** by {{mod}} for **{{reason}}**, case **#{{case}}**

cancel.title: Kick has been canceled
cancel.desc: Kick has been canceled because the cancel button was pressed or 15s has gone by without a reasponce.

log.title: Kicked {{target}}.
log.desc:
{{target}} has been kicked from this server for, {{reason}} by {{mod}}.
Case: **#{{case}}**

areYouSure.title: Are you sure?
areYouSure.desc:
Are you sure you want to banned {{target}}?
This will remove them form the server permanently.
areYouSure.footer: Doing this will force the user to be removed.

responce.title: Banned {{target}}.
responce.desc: {{target}} has been banend from this server for, {{reason}}, case **#{{case}}**.

toUser.content: You have been banned from **{{server}}** by {{mod}} for **{{reason}}**, case **#{{case}}**.

cancel.title: Ban has been canceled
cancel.desc: Ban has been canceled because the cancel button was pressed or 15s has gone by without a reasponce.

log.title: Banned {{target}}.
log.desc:
{{target}} has been banned from this server for, {{reason}} by {{mod}}.
Case: **#{{case}}**

areYouSure.title: Are you sure?
areYouSure.desc: Are you sure you want to warn {{target}}?
areYouSure.footer: Doing this will warn the user and it will be cased.

toUser.content: You have been warned from **{{server}}** by {{mod}} for **{{reason}}**, case **#{{case}}**.

cancel.title: Warn has been canceled
cancel.desc: Warn has been canceled because the cancel button was pressed or 15s has gone by without a reasponce.

log.title: Warned {{target}}.
log.desc:
{{target}} has been warned for, {{reason}} by {{mod}}.
Case: **#{{case}}**

areYouSure.title: Are you sure?
areYouSure.desc:
Are you sure you want to mute {{target}}?
This will add the muted role that you picked in the settings to the user.
areYouSure.footer: Doing this will mute the user and it will be cased.

toUser.content:
You have been muted from **{{server}}** by {{mod}}, case **#{{case}}**.
You will be unmuted in {{time}}.

cancel.title: Mute has been canceled
cancel.desc: Mute has been canceled because the cancel button was pressed or 15s has gone by without a reasponce.

log.title: Muted {{target}}.
log.desc:
{{target}} has been muted until {{time}}, by {{mod}}.
Case: **#{{case}}**

list.title: Current Reminders {{amount}}/{{max}}
list.desc:
The list of reminders that we will remind you about.:
{{- list}}
list.footer: Make sure you have DM's enabled.

deleted.title: Reminder Deleted
deleted.desc:
The reminder {{id}} was deleted.
We will not remind you about this reminder.

added.title: Reminder added!
added.footer: Make sure your DM's are opened for us!

vote.msg: You can now vote for {{client}}, here!: {{- link}}

defaultResponces.commandMissing: The `{{command}}` command, was not found. Try again later!

error.title: Oops, we have an issue!
error.unknown: An unknown error has happened, Try again later!
error.known:
An issue has happened, Try again later!
Error: {{- error}}

defaultResponces.iAmMissingPermissions: I am missing permissions. To run this action I need the following permissions. `{{permissions}}`

noAccess.title: Restricted Access
noAccess.desc: Sorry, you do not currently have permission to access this. This action requires, {{- requires}}

missingValues.title: Arguments Values
missingValues.desc: Sorry, but your currently missing the following Arguments/Values, `{{values}}`

new.title: {{bot}} added!
new.descSlash:
Thanks for adding {{bot}}, {{guild}}!
Your slash commands are currently being added to your server.
Enable NSFW to enable nsfw commands on your server!
new.descNoSlash:
Thanks for adding {{bot}}, {{guild}}!
Your slash commands had an issue adding, we will try to readd the slash commands in a bit.
Enable NSFW to enable nsfw commands on your server!

reAdd.title: {{bot}} readded!
reAdd.descSlash:
Thanks for readding {{bot}}, {{guild}} we have loaded your past settings automatically!
Your slash commands are currently being added to your server.
Enable NSFW to enable nsfw commands on your server!
reAdd.descNoSlash:
Thanks for readding {{bot}}, {{guild}} we have loaded your past settings automatically!
Your slash commands had an issue adding, we will try to readd the slash commands in a bit.
Enable NSFW to enable nsfw commands on your server!
